UserAppMenuCustomization.name: UserAppMenuCustomization
UserAppMenuCustomization.description: Represents an individual userâ€™s settings for items in the app menu or App Launcher.

ApplicationId.description: The 15-character ID for the application associated with the menu item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user for these specific settings.

SortOrder.description: The index value that controls where this item appears in the menu. For example, a menu item with a sort order value of 5 will appear between items with sort order values of 3 and 9.
